head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIED, BRITA DIGBY.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIED, BRITA DIGBY.

block.p: FRIED-Brita Digby. Age 88, died peacefully on October 1 at her home in East Hampton, following a series of strokes over the past few years. She is survived by her husband, Walter J. Fried, her daughters Allison Blinken and Ingrid (Mimi) Einstein and her grandchildren Anna Lonergan, Ingrid Blinken and Nicholas, Elizabeth and Abigail Einstein. In accordance with her wishes, there will be no funeral service. FRIED-Brita D. The law firm of Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver & Jacobson offers its deepest condolences to esteemed retired partner Walter J. Fried on the loss of his beloved wife, Brita. We extend our sympathy as well to her daughters and her grandchildren on their great loss.

FRIED-Brita Digby. Age 88, died peacefully on October 1 at her home in East Hampton, following a series of strokes over the past few years. She is survived by her husband, Walter J. Fried, her daughters Allison Blinken and Ingrid (Mimi) Einstein and her grandchildren Anna Lonergan, Ingrid Blinken and Nicholas, Elizabeth and Abigail Einstein. In accordance with her wishes, there will be no funeral service. FRIED-Brita D. The law firm of Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver & Jacobson offers its deepest condolences to esteemed retired partner Walter J. Fried on the loss of his beloved wife, Brita. We extend our sympathy as well to her daughters and her grandchildren on their great loss.
